title: [BUG] When performing Sagemaker update the Data Capture setting are gone from a Sagemaker Endpoint

labels.name: area/model-registry
labels.description: Model registry, model registry APIs, and the fluent client calls for model registry

labels.name: has-closing-pr
labels.description: This issue has a closing PR

body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute a bug fix at this time.

### MLflow version

- Client: 1.29.0
- Tracking server: 1.x.y


### System information

- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:
- **Python version**:
- **yarn version, if running the dev UI**:


### Describe the problem

When I create an endpoint using create_deployment call and supply the following data capture config `data_capture_config = {
    'EnableCapture': True,
    'InitialSamplingPercentage': data_capture_InitialSamplingPercentage,
    'DestinationS3Uri': data_capture_bucket,
    'CaptureOptions': [
        {'CaptureMode': 'Input'},
        {'CaptureMode': 'Output'}
    ]
}`
I do see the data capture setting in AWS Console. But when I execute the update_deployment call against the same endpoint using the same config, the data capture settings are gone from the console. 


### Tracking information

_No response_

### Code to reproduce issue

You can use any test configuration
```
if endpoint_exists:
    config['mode']=mlflow.sagemaker.DEPLOYMENT_MODE_REPLACE
    config['data_capture_config']=data_capture_config
    client.update_deployment(
    deployment_name,
    flavor="python_function",
    model_uri=model_uri,
    config=config)
else:
    client.create_deployment(
    deployment_name,
    flavor="python_function",
    model_uri=model_uri,
    config=config
)
```

### Stack trace

none

### Other info / logs

_No response_
